full_summary:
====================================

**Tender Title**
-------------- 
TBIPS – PROJECT MANAGEMENT SERVICES WITH MULTIPLE RESOURCE CATEGORIES

**Tender Reference Number**
-------------------------

CB-5926-38353124

**Amendment Number**
-------------------

4

**Notice Type**
---------------

Request for Proposal (RFP) - 23-58018

**Tender Closing Date**
-----------------------

July 7, 2023, at 14:00 Eastern Standard Time

**Expected Contract Duration**
-----------------------------

Commencing July 4, 2023, and concluding June 30, 2025

**Tender Description**
---------------------

The Knowledge Information and Technology Services (KITS) Branch at National Research Council Canada invites proposals for project management services with multiple resource categories.

The successful bidder will provide Level 3 Technical Writing, Project Management, Project Executive, and Project Coordination services on an "as and when needed" basis to execute IM/IT related projects as per the demand of the client.

**Selection Criteria**
---------------------

The proposal will be evaluated based on the combined rating of technical merit and price. The bidder with the highest combined rating will be selected.

**Trade Agreements**
------------------

This RFP is open to bidders from Canada, Chile, Panama, WTO GPA member countries, Korea, the European Union, and Canada.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For any inquiries, please contact:
 
Roxanne Azzi Abboud  
Phone: (613) 299-9650  
Email: [Roxanne.AzziAbboud@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:Roxanne.AzziAbboud@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)  
Address: K1A 0R6 Ottawa, Ontario, Canada  

**Tender Documents**
-------------------

The tender notice, amendment, and RFP documents are available at:  
[https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/5926/23-58018\_npp\_project-management-services\_rev.1.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/5926/23-58018\_npp\_project-management-services\_rev.1.pdf),  
[https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/5926/23-58018\_npp\_project-management-services.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender
